name: Warehouse Madness #LD42
description:
Hi, i’m Andrea Di Bartolo, 3d Artist currently working for Shoppe Keep 2, this is my second Ludum Dare when i try, as an artist, to do a game all by myself! 
Warehouse Madness is a game where you gotta help Tone the Robot handling the deliver of countless packages, the game has very simple rules: Packages arrive every 4 seconds, you can stack them in the shelves and deliver in the delivery zone in a specific order (big,medium,small), the starting pile can contain 4 packages maximum, if a package should be delivered and that pile is full, you get a penalty, at 4 penalites you lose!

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left Click/E - Pickup package

Right Click/R - Place package
